import { AnuncioService } from 'src/app/Services/AnuncioService'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pesquisa', templateUrl: './pesquisa.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pesquisa.component.css'], }) export class PesquisaComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private anuncioService: AnuncioService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} buscarAnunciosPorDescricao(descricao: string) { this.anuncioService.BuscarTodosAnunciosOuPorDescricao(descricao).subscribe( (result) => { if (result != null) { debugger; } }, () => { alert( `Nenhuma categoria encontrada. Verifique a conexão com a internet.` ); } ); debugger; } }
